title: Congratulations!
body: You won a £500 gift card! To claim, enter your address and bank details.

choices.label: Claim prize
choices.feedback: Risky choice. Real prizes don’t ask for bank details. This is a common scam to steal money and identity.

choices.label: Ignore this message
choices.feedback: Right move. If you didn’t enter a contest, it’s almost certainly a scam.
